name: Full Body Strength
description: A well-rounded strength training routine that targets all major muscle groups.
instructions: Perform each exercise with proper form, resting for 60-90 seconds between sets. Adjust weights as needed.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
exercises.instructions: Keep your body straight, lower your chest to just above the floor, and push back up.

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.description: A compound lower body exercise that engages the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
exercises.instructions: Keep feet shoulder-width apart, lower yourself by bending your knees, then push back up through your heels.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the posterior chain, including hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.
exercises.instructions: Keep your back straight, hinge at your hips, and lift the bar by engaging your glutes and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that builds back and biceps strength.
exercises.instructions: Grip the bar shoulder-width apart, pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar, and lower slowly.

name: Upper Body Hypertrophy
description: A workout designed for upper body muscle growth and endurance.
instructions: Use moderate to heavy weights, focusing on controlled movements. Rest for 45-60 seconds between sets.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An overhead press that targets the deltoid muscles.
exercises.instructions: Keep your core engaged, press the dumbbells overhead, and slowly lower them back to shoulder level.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: A variation of the bench press focusing on the upper chest.
exercises.instructions: Set the bench at a 30-45 degree angle, lower the bar to your chest, and press it back up.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: An isolated exercise for strengthening the biceps.
exercises.instructions: Keep your elbows close to your body and curl the dumbbells up without swinging.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: A bodyweight movement that strengthens the triceps.
exercises.instructions: Lower yourself until your elbows are at a 90-degree angle, then push yourself back up.

name: Lower Body Power
description: A workout designed to build lower body strength and power.
instructions: Focus on explosive movements and good form. Rest for 60-90 seconds between sets.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: A single-leg squat variation that increases balance and lower body strength.
exercises.instructions: Place your back foot on a bench, lower yourself until your front thigh is parallel to the floor, then push back up.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.description: A deadlift variation targeting hamstrings and glutes.
exercises.instructions: Hinge at the hips while keeping your back straight, lower the bar down your legs, and return to standing.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: A simple exercise for strengthening the calf muscles.
exercises.instructions: Stand on the balls of your feet and lift your heels as high as possible before lowering back down.

name: Cardio Blast
description: A high-intensity cardio workout to boost endurance and burn calories.
instructions: Perform each exercise with maximum effort, resting for 30 seconds between rounds.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: A full-body cardio exercise that improves agility and endurance.
exercises.instructions: Keep your core tight and jump continuously at a steady pace.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A high-intensity movement that works the entire body.
exercises.instructions: Drop into a squat, jump into a push-up position, perform a push-up, then jump back up explosively.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A dynamic movement that targets core and cardio endurance.
exercises.instructions: Keep your core tight and drive your knees toward your chest in a running motion.

name: Core & Abs
description: A workout designed to strengthen the core and improve stability.
instructions: Perform each exercise with control, resting for 30-45 seconds between sets.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: An isometric exercise that builds core endurance.
exercises.instructions: Keep your body in a straight line and engage your core throughout.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: A rotational core exercise targeting the obliques.
exercises.instructions: Keep your feet off the floor and twist your torso side to side.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: An exercise that strengthens the lower abs.
exercises.instructions: Keep your lower back on the floor and raise your legs to 90 degrees before lowering them slowly.

name: Mobility & Stretching
description: A stretching routine to improve flexibility and mobility.
instructions: Hold each stretch for 20-30 seconds, breathing deeply.

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.description: A yoga stretch that improves hamstring and shoulder flexibility.
exercises.instructions: Push your hips back, straighten your legs, and press your heels toward the ground.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch for the hip flexors and quadriceps.
exercises.instructions: Kneel on one knee, push your hips forward, and hold.

name: Athletic Performance
description: A workout focused on improving speed, agility, and explosiveness.
instructions: Perform each exercise with intensity, resting for 45-60 seconds between sets.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: An explosive movement to build lower body power.
exercises.instructions: Jump onto a sturdy box, landing softly, then step down.

exercises.name: Sled Push
exercises.description: A full-body movement for developing speed and endurance.
exercises.instructions: Keep your back straight, lean forward, and push the sled as fast as possible.

exercises.name: Lateral Cone Drills
exercises.description: A drill to improve agility and lateral movement.
exercises.instructions: Move side to side quickly, touching each cone in a controlled manner.

name: Bodyweight HIIT
description: A fast-paced bodyweight workout to burn fat and increase endurance.
instructions: Perform each exercise with full intensity for 30 seconds, then rest for 15 seconds.

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation that builds explosive strength.
exercises.instructions: Lower into a squat and explode upward, landing softly.

exercises.name: Plank to Shoulder Taps
exercises.description: A dynamic core and stability exercise.
exercises.instructions: Hold a plank and alternate tapping your shoulders with opposite hands.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: A unilateral movement for leg strength and balance.
exercises.instructions: Step forward, lower until your back knee is just above the ground, and push back up.

name: Endurance Training
description: A workout focused on building cardiovascular endurance and stamina.
instructions: Maintain a steady pace, focusing on consistency and breathing.

exercises.name: Treadmill Running
exercises.description: A steady-state cardio workout to improve endurance.
exercises.instructions: Run at a steady pace, keeping your breathing controlled.

exercises.name: Rowing Machine
exercises.description: A full-body cardio exercise that targets endurance.
exercises.instructions: Row at a steady pace, focusing on smooth strokes.

exercises.name: Cycling
exercises.description: A low-impact endurance exercise.
exercises.instructions: Keep a consistent cadence and adjust resistance as needed.

name: Flexibility & Yoga
description: A routine designed to improve flexibility, reduce stress, and aid recovery.
instructions: Hold each position for 20-30 seconds, breathing deeply.

exercises.name: Child’s Pose
exercises.description: A relaxation stretch for the back and hips.
exercises.instructions: Sit back onto your heels, stretch your arms forward, and relax.

exercises.name: Seated Forward Fold
exercises.description: A hamstring and lower back stretch.
exercises.instructions: Sit with legs extended and reach forward toward your toes.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: A mobility movement for spinal flexibility.
exercises.instructions: Alternate between arching and rounding your back in a smooth motion.
